mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oms_cart_item (product_id, member_id, quantity, create_date, modify_date) VALUES (#{productId}, #{memberId}, 1, #{created}, #{modified})
mapper.select: SELECT product_id, member_id, create_date, modify_date FROM oms_cart_item WHERE member_id=#{memberId} AND product_id=#{productId};
mapper.update: UPDATE oms_cart_item SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE member_id=#{memberId} AND product_id=#{productId};
